textAfterTable: 6.3 Bugs needing version field changed 6.4 Bugs to be marked as RESOLVED 6.5 Bugs to be marked as INVALID 6.6 Bugs to be marked as DUPLICATE 6.7 Bugs needing users with particular setups 6.8 Bugs needing attention from Amarok developers 6.9 Bugs awaiting feedback 6.10 Bugs not related to today 6.11 Bugs that you can't do 7 High Profile Introduction This bug day will take place on Sunday, June 15th 2008, but feel free to start early. The aim of this bug day is to clear as many Amarok bugs as possible. Our target for triage is bugs listed in bugs.kde.org under the product Amarok. The goal of this bug-day is to check for bugs that are fixed, duplicates, are not going to be fixed in Amarok 1.4.x or are already fixed/implemented in Amarok 2. This will enable the Amarok developers to deal with bugs more easily, and so have more time left to actually code on Amarok 2. When you have closed or commented on a bug, please list it in the appropriate section below, so that a second triager can see if they can confirm it. Be sure to join #kde-bugs
